thread.title: TOWIE's Tommy Mallet squirms in cringeworthy interview as he confirms wedding to Georgia is 'on the cards'
thread.title_full: TOWIE's Tommy Mallet squirms in cringeworthy interview as he confirms wedding to Georgia is 'on the cards'

author: Kyle O'Sullivan
title: TOWIE's Tommy Mallet squirms in cringeworthy interview as he confirms wedding to Georgia is 'on the cards'
text:
TOWIE's Tommy Mallet squirms in cringeworthy interview as he confirms wedding to Georgia is 'on the cards' The power couple also slammed their new cast members Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Tommy Mallet confirms wedding to Georgia is 'on the cards' Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Tommy Mallet squirmed in a cringeworthy interview as he struggled to answer questions about his future with girlfriend Gerogia Kousoulou. 
The TOWIE power couple opened up about their relationship on Lorraine and discussed the dramatic impact that their new cast mates were having on the new series, which started last Sunday. 
Stand-in host Christine Lampard said she could see Tommy being "quite romantic behind closed doors", before asking him if he would propose in the future. 
Christine said: "There are lots of whispers as there always are about wedding bells, engagements, all sorts of things happening on TOWIE, could we see a proper TOWIE wedding between you two?" Read More Georgia and Tomym took to the Lorraine sofa (Photo: ITV) 
Georgia sheepishly asked: "Could we?" 
A red-faced Tommy replied: "Oh, you’ve put me on the spot. I suppose so. Yeah it’s on the cards." 
The loved-up pair, who have been dating for nearly three years after meeting on the ITVBe show, have become one of TOWIE's longest standing couples and have avoided most of the drama that surrounds the famous cast. Tommy didn't give a definitive answer about a TOWIE wedding (Photo: ITV) 
Georgia revealed that she has set out a “bible of ground rules”, consisting of two pages of orders that dictate how Tommy should behave. 
Tommy said: "We broke the TOWIE curse. The curse is going on personal appearances and cheating on your girlfriend, but I haven’t done that. 
"Now I don’t have girls coming up to me and trying to stick it on me, they all just say how much they love us." Read More TOWIE newbie Jamie Reed was planning on MARRYING Amber Turner before she dumped him for Dan Edgar Christine grilled the couple about their future (Photo: ITV) 
The couple also had time to slam their new cast members who have stirred things up since appearing on the 20th series of the reality show. 
Speaking about the explosive drama surrounding Amber Turner and Jamie Reed, Tommy said it had "changed overnight". 
Georgia added: "I think it’s come out of nowhere. It is literally I think new people have come on and nobody expected them to cause such a stir. 
"Literally everyone was friends and the next minute they wasn’t." Georgia said the newbies had been causing drama (Photo: ITV) 
Viewers went to Twitter to air their support for TOWIE pair and urge Tommy to get down on one knee. 
One fan of the couple said: "@tommy_mallet u have 2 propose 2 Georgia soon we need the 1st towie wedding. U's 2 r literally soul mates it so cute. Match made in heaven" 
Another added: "@MissGeorgiakx & @tommy_mallet on Lorraine this morning, proper goals man they just so in love" 
A third said: "Aww seeing @MissGeorgiakx & @tommy_mallet on #Lorraine are legit my fav couple" 
The Only Way Is Essex continues on Sunday at 10.00pm on ITVBe. Like us on Facebook
